data.text: Wonderful hotel in terms of hospitality, accessibility, cleanliness. Right at the business bay metro station which make things very easy and accessible for the visitors. Connectivity is the key while traveling. So, recommend this one.
data.title: Highly recommend this hotel

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest,

Thank you for sharing your feedback on Tripadvisor.

It is always rewarding to receive such praise regarding our products and services. Compliments like yours keep us all very motivated in creating an amazing experience for our guests.

The whole team looks forward to welcoming you back soon.

Best regards,

Ulrich Hoffmeister
General Manager
owner_response.author: Villa Rotana

data.text:
My experience during the 2-day stay at Villa Rotana was fantastic. The hotel's location is incredibly convenient, within walking distance to the Business Bay metro station, supermarkets, restaurants, and shops. Additionally, the proximity to the Etihad Airways coach station, just a 5-minute walk away, made it extremely practical.

The staff at Villa Rotana were exceptionally friendly and eager to assist. Esraa the receptionist came to carry my giant heavy luggage when i reached the hotel entrance. Despite arriving for check-in at 4:30 pm and finding my room wasn't ready, Esraa promptly informed me it would be ready in 30 minutes and graciously offered me a temporary room to freshen up while I waited. This gesture was greatly appreciated.

The housekeeping team was also commendable, as they efficiently cleaned and mopped the living room floor of my suite the following day, knowing I had hosted friends there the previous evening.

The All Day Dining service and kitchen staff were equally friendly, and I thoroughly enjoyed the breakfast options available.

Overall, my stay at Villa Rotana was excellent, and I will certainly be recommending it to friends and family.
data.title: Super stay!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest,

Thank you for sharing your feedback on Tripadvisor.

At Villa Rotana, we strive to offer the best experiences for our guests and I am happy to learn that our efforts had reflected on your recent visit. I will ensure that your positive feedback is passed on to the team. 

We look forward to hosting you again.

Best regards,

Ulrich Hoffmeister
General Manager
owner_response.author: Villa Rotana

data.text: Villa Rotana the best hotel in Dubai Down Town, all the reception staff are very good, they will always help solve all issues quickly and efficiently. The hotel manager is very attentive to the guests. Thank you for your attention. The cleaning is good, everyone is friendly. The pool and gym are excellent, as well as the staff in the gym and pool area. I don't want to leave such a hotel. I will definitely come back again.  Special thanks to Abdul. Thank you so much for everything.
data.title: The best hotel

I am certain that the whole team looks forward to having the opportunity to welcome you back here at Villa Rotana.

Best regards,

Ulrich Hoffmeister

data.text: Staff was so helpful. Did best of the services they could . Special thanis to Supun, he helped us alot. Will keep this hotel in mind whenever visiting dubai again.  The whole experience at this hotel was 10/10. Thank you guys
data.title: Very convenient

data.text: Great hotel with the best facilities! The location is convenient and you get great views for the Burj. The staff are also a great asset to the villa; Supun from reception is an exceptional host and never hesitated to help. The staff from the gym and swimming pool were kind and helpful too. Samuel would always greet with a lovely smile and offered an excellent service at breakfast.  Housekeeping provided a great service especially Mercy she happily went through any minor requests we have and kept the rooms clean always.
data.title: Excellent hotel!
